description: '''Warda Al-Jazairia''' ({{langx|ar|وردة الجزائرية}}; born '''Warda Mohammed Ftouki''' ({{Lang|ar|وردة محمد فتوكي}}); 22 July 1939 – 17 May 2012) was an Algerian singer. She was well known for her [[Egyptian Arabic]] songs and music. Her name was sometimes shortened to just '''Warda''' ({{IPA|ar|ˈwæɾdæ|lang}} meaning "rose") or as "The Algerian rose" in the [[Arab world]].
